analysis.key_quote: It is important that every worker in our country has the right to not being fired without explanation, and without due cause per terms of the initial work agreement - be they governmental employees -- at any and all levels -- or workers/employees contracted to private employers.
analysis.rationale: The comment emphasizes the importance of due process and employee rights, opposing any regulations that would undermine these protections. It expresses concern that the proposed regulations do not adequately safeguard these rights, indicating a clear opposition to the rule.
